message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering its worth and the importance it holds for you, I propose to sell it to you for $1150000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. Kindly let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
